Subject: Currently on 11.6.0.55 and needing to upgrade
Description: During health check noticed a number of issues on scans. Saw product has not been updated in about a year. Wanted to get on the latest version and see if it resolves any of the issues. If not, have support walk through resolving issues. Products: AD, FS, Windows, Entra
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom

During health check noticed a number of issues on scans. Saw product has not been updated in about a year. Wanted to get on the latest version and see if it resolves any of the issues. If not, have support walk through resolving issues. Products: AD, FS, Windows, Entra

Cause

Requested an Upgrade to attempt to resolve some issues with multiple jobs as a result of a health check.

Resolution

Will include the official upgrade process of the NEA application to the latest version. The prerequisites for this upgrade are as follows:
Perform a snapshot of the NEA application server the day of the upgrade.
Verify that there are no scheduled jobs running or about to run during the upgrade process.
Perform a full backup of the NEA SQL database. The name of this database can be found under the storage node in the NEA management console. 
Download the latest installers from the netwrix.com customer site. The installer for your environment are listed below:
Netwrix Enterprise Auditor Management Platform (11.6.0.127)
Sensitive Data Discovery (11.6.0.15)
Access Information Center (11.6.0.32)
We then performed the upgrade process which is described in the documentation below:

Enterprise Auditor Console Upgrade
 
Upgrade Procedure
Account_Name__c: Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Kansas, Inc. (BCBSKS)
